name: Avant Garden
description:
A relaxing game about reclaiming a city with plants.

Instructions:

To plant seeds drag them onto the soil and then water them. If one of a plants leaves dies use to the clipper to remove it and keep the plant healthy. To get more plants collect the seeds that are produced when plants are pollinated. 

You gain experience when plants get pollinated, fill the experience bar in the top right and you take over more of the city.
